short_definition: One having opposing parties; contested, as distinguished from a hearing in which only one party appears.
long_definition_html: One having opposing parties; contested, as distinguished from a hearing in which only one party appears.
long_definition_markdown: One having opposing parties; contested, as distinguished from a hearing in which only one party appears.
long_definition_text: One having opposing parties; contested, as distinguished from a hearing in which only one party appears.
